scripts.build:pulse-planner:dev: ng build --extra-webpack-config projects/pulse-planner-app/webpack.externals.js --configuration=dev --base-href="" --project pulse-planner-app --single-bundle --output-hashing none && node build-elements.js pulse-planner-app dev
scripts.build:pulse-planner:uat: ng build --extra-webpack-config projects/pulse-planner-app/webpack.externals.js --configuration=uat --base-href="" --project pulse-planner-app --single-bundle --output-hashing none && node build-elements.js pulse-planner-app uat
scripts.build:pulse-planner:prod: ng build --extra-webpack-config projects/pulse-planner-app/webpack.externals.js --configuration=production --base-href="" --project pulse-planner-app --single-bundle --output-hashing none && node build-elements.js pulse-planner-app prod
scripts.build-all: npm run build:pulse-planner:dev && npm run build:pulse-planner:uat && npm run build:pulse-planner:prod
scripts.build:planner:externals: ng build --extra-webpack-config projects/planner/webpack.externals.js --prod --project planner --single-bundle --output-hashing none && node build-elements.js planner
scripts.build:sample-app:externals: ng build --extra-webpack-config projects/sample-app/webpack.externals.js --prod --project sample-app --single-bundle --output-hashing none && node build-elements.js sample-app
